Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.ws

Interface EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EjbcaWSHelperSession
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EjbcaWSHelperSessionBean
    public interface EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal
extends EjbcaWSHelperSession
    Local interface for EjbcaWSHelperSession. These methods are used from EjbcaWS only
    Version:
    $Id: EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal.java 29326 2018-06-25 12:45:51Z bastianf $

    • Method Detail

      • getAdmin

        AuthenticationToken getAdmin​(boolean allowNonAdmins,
                             X509Certificate cert)
                      throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Gets an AuthenticationToken object for a WS-API administrator authenticated with the given client certificate. - Checks (through authenticationSession.authenticate) that the certificate is valid - If (WebConfiguration.getRequireAdminCertificateInDatabase) checks (through authenticationSession.authenticate) that the admin certificate is not revoked. - If (allowNonAdmin == false), checks that the admin have access to /administrator, i.e. really is an administrator with the certificate mapped in an admin role. Does not check any other authorization though, other than that it is an administrator.
        Parameters:
        cert - The X.509 client certificate.
        allowNonAdmins - false if we should verify that it is a real administrator, true only extracts the certificate and checks that it is not revoked.
        Returns:
        AuthenticationToken object based on the SSL client certificate
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if no client certificate or allowNonAdmins == false and the cert does not belong to an admin

      • convertUserMatch

        Query convertUserMatch​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                       UserMatch usermatch)
                throws CADoesntExistsException,
                       AuthorizationDeniedException,
                       EndEntityProfileNotFoundException
        Method that converts profile names etc to corresponding ID's
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        usermatch - a usermatch containing names of profiles
        Returns:
        a query containing id's of profiles.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if searching by a CA which the admin is not authorized to.
        CADoesntExistsException - if searching for a non-existent CA.
        EndEntityProfileNotFoundException - if usermatch was for and end entity profile, and that profile didn't exist

      • returnAuthorizedCertificates

        List<Certificate> returnAuthorizedCertificates​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                               Collection<Certificate> certs,
                                               boolean validate,
                                               long nowMillis)
        Checks authorization for each certificate and optionally check that it's valid. Does not check revocation status.
        Parameters:
        admin - is the admin used for authorization
        certs - is the collection of certs to verify
        validate - set to true to perform validation of each certificate
        nowMillis - current time
        Returns:
        a List of valid and authorized certificates

      • checkValidityAndSetUserPassword

        void checkValidityAndSetUserPassword​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                     Certificate cert,
                                     String username,
                                     String password)
                              throws CertificateNotYetValidException,
                                     CertificateExpiredException,
                                     EndEntityProfileValidationException,
                                     AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                     NoSuchEndEntityException,
                                     ApprovalException,
                                     WaitingForApprovalException
        Verifies that the given certificate has a correct signature and is currently valid, and if so, sets the end entity status to NEW and sets its password. Used from EjbcaWS.cvcRequest during renewals.
        Parameters:
        admin - authentication token
        cert - certificate to check validity and signature of.
        username - username of end entity to update.
        password - new password to set for end entity.
        Throws:
        CertificateNotYetValidException - if the certificate is not yet valid
        CertificateExpiredException - if the certificate has expired
        EndEntityProfileValidationException - if the password does not satisfy the requirements in the end entity profile
        NoSuchEndEntityException - if there's no end entity with the given username
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if not authorized to the given end entity
        ApprovalException - if an approval error occurred while setting end entity status
        WaitingForApprovalException - if approval is required for setting the end entity status

      • resetUserPasswordAndStatus

        void resetUserPasswordAndStatus​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                String username,
                                int status)
        Resets the password and restores the status for the given end entity. Used for restoring the end entity status if a certificate request operation failed. All exceptions are swallowed and error-logged, since this method is intended to be called from catch blocks.
        Parameters:
        admin - authentication token.
        username - username of end entity
        status - original end entity status to restore
